 Promotion on 8th March for Loyalty program members (2014) 1. Program 1: Beauty treatment (advice and products) from Yves Rocher (before 2pm 8th March, 2014) Eligibility: Female members ranking Diamond, Gold and Titan and having the address in Hải Phòng, Đà Nẵng, Biên Hòa and Cần Thơ Not applied for: internal administrative subscribers, trial SIM cards, subscribers with internal customer service purposes. Benefits: Free beauty treatment (advice and products) worth VND600.000 Members will receive phone call of advice and confirmation of agreement to receive products. If agree, products will be sent to members' addresses. Quantity : Location Quantity Hải Phòng 100 Đà Nẵng 120 Đồng Nai (Biên Hòa) 100 Cần Thơ 100 Priority: Diamond members with membership card > Diamond members without membership card > Gold members with membership card > Gold members without membership card > Titan members with membership card > Titan members without membership card 2. Program 2: Beauty treatment with Menard cosmetics products from 8th - 31st March, 2014 Eligibility: Female members ranking Diamond, Gold and Titan with membership cards and having the address in Hà Nội và Ho Chi Minh city. Benefits : Discounted price from VND200.000 - VND300.000/service at Menard facial salons chain. Code Services Duration Listed price (VND/time) Discounted price/time Services with price G01 Energizing and strengthening skin's immune system massage 90 400.000 VND200.000 G02 Skin distressing and brightening massage 600.000 G11 Skin hydrating and energizing therapy massage 110 800.000 G14 Special treatment massage to clean and brighten skin Services with price > 800.000đ G03 Therapy massage for aged skin, improving and anti-ageing for skin damaged by sunlight 90 950.000 300.000đ G04 Therapy massage for full restoration (Cell renewal and skin rejuvenation by Linhzhi essence) 1.250.000 G12 Special massage implementing vitamins and brightening skin (ideal for sensitive skin type) 110 950.000 G13 Special treatment massage to brighten skin with melasma 1.050.000 G15 Special treatment massage for sensitive skin type with acne 1.050.000 G16 Special treatment massage to tighten pores and improve skin's appearance 950.000 G50 Body package 90 900.000 How to join : Step 1: for eligible subscribers, send LK_MENARD_email address to 9237 (note: "_" is a single space). Step 2: 9237 system will send the program e-code to Member's phone number. Step 3: After receiving the e-code, Members contact with Menard to book the services at least 1 day in advance , or else, members will not be able to receive the benefits of the program. The amount of e-code must be as same as the amount of discounted services. Step 4: Present Membership card, ID card and e-code when using the services. Step 4: Sign to confirm services usage on receipt after using the services. Menard salons: Location Address Phone no. Hà Nội 18T2, Trung Hòa - Nhân Chính, Thanh Xuân 04-62510935 35 Tuệ Tĩnh, Hai Bà Trưng 04-39742509 Tầng trệt, TTTM The Garden, Mễ Trì, Từ Liêm 04-37940187 76 Nguyễn Du, Hoàn Kiếm 04-39365801 34 Lê Thái Tổ, Hoàn Kiếm 04-39381633 Tầng 1 - 18 Lý Thường Kiệt, Hoàn Kiếm TPHCM 92-94-94 Bis Võ Thị Sáu, Phường Tân Định, Quận 1 08-38203609 Shop 5, khách sạn New World, đường Phạm Hồng Thái, Quận 1 08-38258199 3. SMS for female members for Women's day on 8th March: Tiếng Việt English Content Ketnoidailau: Mobifone xin gui nhung loi chuc tot dep nhat nhan ngay quoc te phu nu 8/3. Kinh chuc Quy hoi vien suc khoe, hanh phuc, thanh dat. Loyalty program: Best wishes from Mobifone on Women's Day. We wish you health, happiness and prosperity. SIM &#12539;&#12431;&#12364;&#31038;&#12398; &#30058;&#21495;&#12434;&#21033;&#29992;&#12375;&#12390;&#12356;&#12427;&#20250;&#21729;&#12383;&#12385;&#12290; &#29305;&#21029;&#25201;&#12356;&#65306; &#12465;&#12450;&#12469;&#12540;&#12499;&#12473;&#65288;&#35069;&#21697;&#12434;&#26696;&#20869;&#12539;&#25552;&#20379;&#65289;&#12289;&#20385;&#26684;&#12399;60&#19975;&#12489;&#12531;&#12384;&#12290; &#35069;&#21697;&#25968; : &#22580;&#25152; &#35069;&#21697;&#25968; Hải Phòng 100 Đà Nẵng 120 Đồng Nai (Biên Hòa) 100 Cần Thơ 100 &#20778;&#20808;&#25163;&#38918;&#65306; &#20250;&#21729;&#12459;&#12540;&#12489;&#12364;&#12354;&#12427;&#12480;&#12452;&#12516;&#12514;&#12531;&#12489;&#20250;&#21729; SMS&#12434;&#36865;&#12427;&#26399;&#38291; 2014&#24180;03&#26376;08&#26085;&#65288;&#21320;&#21069;&#65306;8&#26178;&#21322;-11&#26178;&#65307;&#21320;&#24460;&#65306;2&#26178;-5&#26178;&#65289; &#50864;&#47049;&#44256;&#44061; &#50864;&#45824;&#54532;&#47196;&#44536;&#47016;&#51032; &#54924;&#50896;&#50640; 3&#50900; 8&#51068; &#44397;&#51228;&#50668;&#49457;&#51032;&#45216; &#47582;&#51060;&#54616;&#50668; &#51060;&#48292;&#53944; (2014&#45380;) 1. &#51060;&#48292;&#53944;1: Yves Rocher &#51228;&#55092;&#49324;&#54620;&#53580;&#49436; &#52992;&#50612;&#49436;&#48708;&#49828; (&#49345;&#45812;&#44284; &#51228;&#54408; &#51228;&#44277;) (2014&#45380; 3&#50900; 8&#51068; &#50724;&#54980; 2&#49884; &#51204;&#50640;) &#51201;&#50857;&#48276;&#50948;: Hai Phong, Da Nang, Bien Hoa, Can Tho&#50640;&#49436; &#51452;&#49548;&#44032; &#51080;&#45716; &#45796;&#51060;&#50500;&#47788;&#46300;, &#44264;&#46300;, &#54000;&#53444;&#45700; &#50668;&#49457; &#54924;&#50896; &#51201;&#50857; &#50504; &#46104;&#45716; &#44221;&#50864;: &#44277;&#47924;&#50896; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228; , &#53580;&#49828;&#53944; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228; , &#45236;&#48512; &#50629;&#47924; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228; &#54812;&#53469;: &#52992;&#50612;&#49436;&#48708;&#49828; (&#49345;&#45812;&#44284; &#51228;&#54408; &#51228;&#44277;) ( 600.000 &#46041; &#51004;&#47196; &#46041;&#46321;&#54620;&#45796;) &#54924;&#50896;&#50640;&#44172; &#53685;&#54868;&#47196; &#49345;&#45812;&#54644;&#46300;&#47532;&#47728; &#51228;&#54408;&#51012; &#48155;&#51012; &#44163;&#51012; &#54869;&#51064;&#54624; &#44163;&#51060;&#45796;. &#46041;&#51032;&#54624; &#44221;&#50864;&#50640; &#54924;&#50896;&#51032; &#51452;&#49548;&#50640; &#51228;&#54408;&#51012; &#48372;&#45244; &#44163;&#51060;&#45796;. &#49688;&#47049;: &#51648;&#50669; &#49688;&#47049; Hải Phòng 100 Đà Nẵng 120 Đồng Nai (Biên Hòa) 100 Cần Thơ 100 &#50864;&#49440; &#49692;&#49436; : &#54924;&#50896;&#52852;&#46300;&#47484; &#48156;&#44553;&#48155;&#51008; &#45796;&#51060;&#50500;&#47788;&#46300; &#54924;&#50896; -> &#54924;&#50896;&#52852;&#46300;&#47484; &#48156;&#44553;&#48155;&#51648; &#50506;&#45716; &#45796;&#51060;&#50500;&#47788;&#46300; &#54924;&#50896;->&#54924;&#50896;&#52852;&#46300;&#47484; &#48156;&#44553;&#48155;&#51008; &#44264;&#46300; &#54924;&#50896; -> &#54924;&#50896;&#52852;&#46300;&#47484; &#48156;&#44553;&#48155;&#51648; &#50506;&#45716; &#44264;&#46300; &#54924;&#50896; -> &#54924;&#50896;&#52852;&#46300;&#47484; &#48156;&#44553;&#48155;&#51008; &#54000;&#53444;&#45700; &#54924;&#50896; -> &#54924;&#50896;&#52852;&#46300;&#47484; &#48156;&#44553;&#48155;&#51648; &#50506;&#45716; 2. &#51060;&#48292;&#53944; 2: 2014&#45380; 3&#50900; 8&#51068;&#48512;&#53552; 2014&#45380; 3&#50900; 31&#51068;&#44620;&#51648; Menard &#54924;&#51109;&#54408;&#51004;&#47196; &#48120;&#50857;&#52992;&#50612; &#51201;&#50857;&#48276;&#50948;: Ha Noi, TPHCM&#50640;&#49436; &#51452;&#49548;&#44032; &#51080;&#45716; &#45796;&#51060;&#50500;&#47788;&#46300;, &#44264;&#46300;, &#54000;&#53444;&#45700; &#50668;&#49457; &#54924;&#50896; &#54812;&#53469;: Menard facial salons &#49884;&#49828;&#53596;&#50640;&#49436; &#49436;&#48708;&#49828;&#47484; &#51060;&#50857;&#54624; &#46412; &#54812;&#53469;&#44032;&#44201;&#51004;&#47196; 200.000&#46041; - 300.000&#46041;/&#48264; &#51201;&#50857;&#51060; &#46112; &#44163;&#51060;&#45796;. &#49436;&#48708;&#49828; &#53076;&#46300; &#49436;&#48708;&#49828; &#49884;&#44036; &#51221;&#52272;&#51228; &#53444;&#47141; &#48143; &#49688;&#48516;&#44284; &#50689;&#50577;&#51012; &#44277;&#44553;&#54616;&#45716; &#47560;&#49324;&#51648; 90 400.000 200.000&#46041; G02 &#49828;&#53944;&#47112;&#49828;&#47484; &#51204;&#54868;&#48264;&#54840;&#47484; &#51060;&#50857;&#54644;&#49436; LK_MENARD_&#47700;&#51068;&#51452;&#49548; &#47928;&#51088; &#47700;&#49884;&#51648;&#47484; &#51089;&#49457;&#54616;&#50668; &#53076;&#46300; (e-code)&#47484; &#48372;&#45236;&#46300;&#47536;&#45796;. 3&#52264;: e-code&#47484; &#48155;&#51008; &#54980;&#50640; &#49436;&#48708;&#49828;&#47484; &#51060;&#50857;&#54616;&#44592; &#51204;&#50640; &#52572;&#49548; 1&#51068; &#51060;&#51204;&#50640; Menard&#50752; &#50672;&#46973;&#54644;&#50556; &#54620;&#45796;. &#50672;&#46973;&#54616;&#51648; &#50506;&#51004;&#47732; &#51060;&#48292;&#53944;&#51032; Menard salons&#51032; &#51452;&#49548;: &#51648;&#50669; &#51452;&#49548; &#51204;&#54868;&#48264;&#54840; Hà Nội 18T2, Trung Hòa - Nhân Chính, Thanh Xuân 04-62510935 35 Tuệ Tĩnh, Hai Bà Trưng 04-39742509 Tầng trệt, TTTM The Garden, Mễ Trì, Từ Liêm 04-37940187 76 Nguyễn Du, Hoàn Kiếm 04-39365801 34 Lê Thái Tổ, Hoàn Kiếm 04-39381633 Tầng 1 - 18 Lý Thường Kiệt, Hoàn Kiếm TPHCM 92-94-94 Bis Võ Thị Sáu, Phường Tân Định, Quận 1 08-38203609 Shop 5, khách sạn New World, đường Phạm Hồng Thái, Quận 1 08-38258199 3. 3&#50900; 8&#51068;&#50640; &#50668;&#49457; &#54924;&#50896;&#50640;&#44172; &#52629;&#54616;&#54616;&#45716; &#47928;&#51088; &#47700;&#49884;&#51648; &#45236;&#50857;: &#48288;&#53944;&#45224;&#50612; &#50689;&#50612; &#47928;&#51088; &#47700;&#49884;&#51648; &#45236;&#50857; Ketnoidailau: Mobifone xin gui nhung loi chuc tot dep nhat nhan ngay quoc te phu nu 8/3. Kinh chuc Quy hoi vien suc khoe, hanh phuc, thanh dat. Loyalty program: Best wishes from Mobifone on Women's Day. We wish you health, happiness and prosperity. &#47928;&#51088; &#47700;&#49884;&#51648;&#47484; &#48372;&#45236;&#45716; &#49884;&#44036; 2014&#45380; 03&#50900; 08&#51068; (&#50724;&#51204; 8&#49884;30&#48516;&#48512;&#53552; 11&#49884;&#44620;&#51648;, &#50724;&#54980; 2&#49884;&#48512;&#53552; 5&#49884;&#44620;&#51648;) &#6032;&#6082;&#6033;&#6070;&#6086;&#6050;&#6031;&#6071;&#6032;&#6071;&#6023;&#6035;&#6065;&#6016;&#6070;&#6047;&#6032;&#6098;&#6020;&#6083; 8/3 &#6047;&#6086;&#6042;&#6070;&#6036;&#6091;&#6047;&#6040;&#6070;&#6023;&#6071;&#6016;&#6031;&#6039;&#6098;&#6023;&#6070;&#6036;&#6091;&#6041;&#6076;&#6042;&#6050;&#6020;&#6098;&#6044;&#6082;&#6020; (&#6022;&#6098;&#6035;&#6070;&#6086; 2014) 1. &#6016;&#6040;&#6098;&#6040;&#6044;&#6071;&#6034;&#6072;&#6033;&#6072; 1: &#6032;&#6082;&#6040;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035;&#6047;&#6081;&#6044;&#6070;&#6032;&#6082;&#6033;&#6070;&#6086;(&#6038;&#6071;&#6018;&#6098;&#6042;&#6084;&#6087;&#6035;&#6071;&#6020;&#6037;&#6098;&#6031;&#6043;&#6091;&#6037;&#6043;&#6071;&#6031;&#6037;&#6043;)&#6038;&#6072;&#6026;&#6083;&#6018;&#6076; Yves Rocher (&#6040;&#6075;&#6035;&#6040;&#6089;&#6084;&#6020; 14h&#6032;&#6098;&#6020;&#6083; 8/3/2014) &#6047;&#6086;&#6042;&#6070;&#6036;&#6091;&#6050;&#6098;&#6035;&#6016;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6102; &#6047;&#6040;&#6070;&#6023;&#6071;&#6016;&#6035;&#6070;&#6042;&#6072; &#6032;&#6098;&#6035;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6031;&#6098;&#6036;&#6076;&#6020;,&#6040;&#6070;&#6047; &#6035;&#6071;&#6020; Titan​ &#6040;&#6070;&#6035;&#6050;&#6070;&#6047;&#6096;&#6041;&#6026;&#6098;&#6027;&#6070;&#6035;&#6035;&#6085; Hải Phòng,Đà Nẵng, Biên Hòa và Cần Thơ &#6040;&#6071;&#6035; &#6050;&#6035;&#6075;&#6044;&#6031;&#6098;&#6031;&#6021;&#6086;&#6038;&#6084;&#6087;&#6047;&#6040;&#6070;&#6023;&#6071;&#6016;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6043;&#6081;&#6017;&#6036;&#6086;&#6038;&#6081;&#6025;&#6016;&#6070;&#6042;&#6020;&#6070;&#6042;, &#6043;&#6081;&#6017;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6063;&#6016;&#6033;&#6081;&#6047;,&#6043;&#6081;&#6017;&#6047;&#6070;&#6016;&#6043;&#6098;&#6036;&#6020;&#6047;&#6081;&#6044;&#6070;&#6016;&#6040;&#6098;&#6040;, &#6043;&#6081;&#6017;&#6032;&#6082;&#6033;&#6070;&#6086;&#6050;&#6031;&#6071;&#6032;&#6071;&#6023;&#6035;&#6037;&#6098;&#6033;&#6083;&#6016;&#6098;&#6035;&#6075;&#6020;&#6100; &#6050;&#6070;&#6033;&#6071;&#6039;&#6070;&#6038;&#6102; &#6032;&#6082;&#6040;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035;&#6047;&#6081;&#6044;&#6070;&#6032;&#6082;&#6033;&#6070;&#6086;(&#6038;&#6071;&#6018;&#6098;&#6042;&#6084;&#6087;&#6035;&#6071;&#6020;&#6037;&#6098;&#6031;&#6043;&#6091;&#6037;&#6043;&#6071;&#6031;&#6037;&#6043;)&#6031;&#6086;&#6043;&#6083; 600.000đ &#6047;&#6040;&#6070;&#6023;&#6071;&#6016;&#6035;&#6073;&#6020;&#6036;&#6070;&#6035;&#6048;&#6085;&#6031;&#6070;&#6040;&#6033;&#6076;&#6042;&#6047;&#6096;&#6038;&#6098;&#6033;&#6026;&#6078;&#6040;&#6098;&#6036;&#6072;&#6038;&#6071;&#6018;&#6098;&#6042;&#6084;&#6087;&#6035;&#6071;&#6020;&#6036;&#6025;&#6098;&#6023;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6038;&#6072;&#6016;&#6070;&#6042;&#6041;&#6043;&#6091;&#6038;&#6098;&#6042;&#6040;&#6033;&#6033;&#6077;&#6043;&#6037;&#6043;&#6071;&#6031;&#6037;&#6043;&#6100; &#6036;&#6078;&#6038;&#6098;&#6042;&#6040; &#6037;&#6043;&#6071;&#6031;&#6037;&#6043;&#6035;&#6073;&#6020;&#6031;&#6098;&#6042;&#6076;&#6044;&#6036;&#6070;&#6035;&#6037;&#6098;&#6025;&#6078; &#6023;&#6076;&#6035;&#6026;&#6043;&#6091;&#6050;&#6070;&#6047;&#6096;&#6041;&#6026;&#6098;&#6027;&#6070;&#6035;&#6042;&#6036;&#6047;&#6091;&#6047;&#6040;&#6070;&#6023;&#6071;&#6016;&#6100; &#6021;&#6086;&#6035;&#6077;&#6035; &#6102; &#6033;&#6072;&#6016;&#6035;&#6098;&#6043;&#6082;&#6020; &#6021;&#6086;&#6035;&#6077;&#6035; Hải Phòng 100 Đà Nẵng 120 Đồng Nai (Biên Hòa) 100 Cần Thơ 100 &#6043;&#6086;&#6026;&#6070;&#6036;&#6091;&#6050;&#6070;&#6033;&#6071;&#6039;&#6070;&#6038; &#6102; &#6047;&#6040;&#6070;&#6023;&#6071;&#6016;&#6031;&#6098;&#6036;&#6076;&#6020;&#6036;&#6070;&#6035;&#6040;&#6070;&#6035;&#6016;&#6070;&#6031; > &#6047;&#6040;&#6070;&#6023;&#6071;&#6016;&#6031;&#6098;&#6036;&#6076;&#6020;&#6040;&#6071;&#6035;&#6033;&#6070;&#6035;&#6091;&#6040;&#6070;&#6035;&#6016;&#6070;&#6031; > &#6047;&#6040;&#6070;&#6023;&#6071;&#6016;&#6040;&#6070;&#6047;&#6036;&#6070;&#6035;&#6040;&#6070;&#6035;&#6016;&#6070;&#6031; > &#6047;&#6040;&#6070;&#6023;&#6071;&#6016;&#6040;&#6070;&#6047;​ &#6040;&#6071;&#6035;&#6033;&#6070;&#6035;&#6091;&#6040;&#6070;&#6035;&#6016;&#6070;&#6031; > &#6047;&#6040;&#6070;&#6023;&#6071;&#6016;Titan &#6036;&#6070;&#6035;&#6040;&#6070;&#6035;&#6016;&#6070;&#6031; > &#6047;&#6040;&#6070;&#6023;&#6071;&#6016;Titan &#6040;&#6071;&#6035;&#6033;&#6070;&#6035;&#6091;&#6040;&#6070;&#6035;&#6016;&#6070;&#6031; Hà Nội &#6035;&#6071;&#6020; TPHCM&#6100; &#6050;&#6070;&#6033;&#6071;&#6039;&#6070;&#6038;&#6102; &#6050;&#6035;&#6075;&#6044;&#6031;&#6098;&#6031;&#6031;&#6086;&#6043;&#6083;&#6050;&#6070;&#6033;&#6071;&#6039;&#6070;&#6038;&#6038;&#6072; 200.000đ - 300.000đ/l&#6026;&#6020; &#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6047;&#6081;&#6044;&#6070;&#6016;&#6040;&#6098;&#6040;&#6035;&#6085;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6038;&#6096;&#6035;&#6098;&#6034; Menard facial salons &#6016;&#6076;&#6026;&#6047;&#6081;&#6044;&#6070;&#6016;&#6040;&#6098;&#6040; 90 400.000 200.000đ G02 &#6040;&#6089;&#6070;&#6047;&#6098;&#6047;&#6070; &#6036;&#6035;&#6098;&#6032;&#6041;&#6039;&#6070;&#6038;&#6031;&#6070;&#6035;&#6031;&#6073;&#6020;&#6035;&#6071;&#6020;&#6042;&#6016;&#6098;&#6047;&#6070;&#6047;&#6098;&#6036;&#6082;&#6016;&#6050;&#6084;&#6041;&#6036;&#6070;&#6035;&#6047;&#6098;&#6050;&#6070;&#6031;&#6043;&#6098;&#6050; 1.050.000 G15 &#6040;&#6089;&#6070;&#6047;&#6098;&#6047;&#6070;&#6038;&#6098;&#6041;&#6070;&#6036;&#6070;&#6043;&#6047;&#6098;&#6036;&#6082;&#6016;&#6020;&#6070;&#6041;&#6033;&#6033;&#6077;&#6043;&#6042;&#6020;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6031;&#6071;&#6016;&#6040;&#6098;&#6040;&#6035;&#6071;&#6020;&#6047;&#6098;&#6036;&#6082;&#6016;&#6040;&#6070;&#6035;&#6040;&#6075;&#6035; 1.050.000 G16 &#6040;&#6089;&#6070;&#6047;&#6098;&#6047;&#6070;&#6038;&#6098;&#6041;&#6070;&#6036;&#6070;&#6043;&#6036;&#6020;&#6098;&#6042;&#6077;&#6040;&#6023;&#6078;&#6020;&#6042;&#6084;&#6040;&#6035;&#6071;&#6020;&#6016;&#6082;&#6043;&#6086;&#6050;&#6047;&#6098;&#6036;&#6082;&#6016; LK_MENARD_emai l &#6037;&#6098;&#6025;&#6078;&#6033;&#6085; 9237 (&#6047;&#6086;&#6018;&#6070;&#6043;&#6091;: "_" &#6023;&#6070;&#6047;&#6025;&#6098;&#6025;&#6070;&#6026;&#6016;&#6019;&#6098;&#6043;&#6070;). &#6023;&#6086;&#6048;&#6090;&#6070;&#6035;&#6033;&#6072;2&#6102; &#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6038;&#6096;&#6035;&#6098;&#6034; 9237 &#6035;&#6073;&#6020;&#6037;&#6098;&#6025;&#6078;&#6016;&#6076;&#6026;&#6047;&#6081;&#6044;&#6070; (e-code) &#6026;&#6043;&#6091;&#6043;&#6081;&#6017;&#6033;&#6076;&#6042;&#6047;&#6096;&#6038;&#6098;&#6033;&#6042;&#6036;&#6047;&#6091;&#6047;&#6040;&#6070;&#6023;&#6071;&#6016;&#6100; e-code &#6026;&#6082;&#6043;&#6037;&#6098;&#6031;&#6043;&#6091;&#6031;&#6098;&#6042;&#6076;&#6044;&#6026;&#6076;&#6021;&#6033;&#6085;&#6035;&#6071;&#6020;&#6021;&#6086;&#6035;&#6077;&#6035;&#6026;&#6020;&#6021;&#6075;&#6087; &#6033;&#6076;&#6042;&#6047;&#6096;&#6038;&#6098;&#6033; Hà Nội 18T2, Trung Hòa - Nhân Chính, Thanh Xuân 04-62510935 35 Tuệ Tĩnh, Hai Bà Trưng 04-39742509 Tầng trệt, TTTM The Garden, Mễ Trì, Từ Liêm 04-37940187 76 Nguyễn Du, Hoàn Kiếm 04-39365801 34 Lê Thái Tổ, Hoàn Kiếm 04-39381633 Tầng 1 - 18 Lý Thường Kiệt, Hoàn Kiếm TPHCM 92-94-94 Bis Võ Thị Sáu, Phường Tân Định, Quận 1 08-38203609 Shop 5, khách sạn New World, đường Phạm Hồng Thái, Quận 1 08-38258199 3.&#6017;&#6098;&#6043;&#6073;&#6040;&#6047;&#6070;&#6042;&#6035;&#6083;&#6047;&#6070;&#6042;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035;&#6038;&#6042;&#6026;&#6043;&#6091;&#6047;&#6040;&#6070;&#6023;&#6071;&#6016;&#6035;&#6070;&#6042;&#6072;&#6035;&#6085;&#6032;&#6098;&#6020;&#6083; 8/3 &#6102; &#6039;&#6070;&#6047;&#6070;&#6044;&#6080;&#6031;&#6030;&#6070;&#6040; &#6039;&#6070;&#6047;&#6070;&#6050;&#6020;&#6091;&#6018;&#6098;&#6043;&#6081;&#6047; &#6017;&#6098;&#6043;&#6073;&#6040;&#6047;&#6070;&#6042;&#6035;&#6083;&#6047;&#6070;&#6042; Ketnoidailau: Mobifone xin gui nhung loi chuc tot dep nhat nhan ngay quoc te phu nu 8/3. Kinh chuc Quy hoi vien suc khoe, hanh phuc, thanh dat. Loyalty program: Best wishes from Mobifone on Women's Day. We wish you health, happiness and prosperity. &#6044;&#6081;&#6043;&#6070;&#6037;&#6098;&#6025;&#6078;&#6047;&#6070;&#6042; 08/03 /2013 (&#6038;&#6098;&#6042;&#6073;&#6016;&#6038;&#6072; 8h30-11h00,&#6043;&#6098;&#6020;&#6070;&#6021;&#6038;&#6072; 14h00-17h00)
